name: Detective Rosie Morgan: Death at a Dinner Party
name_original: Detective Rosie Morgan: Death at a Dinner Party
description:
"Detective Rosie Morgan: Death at a Dinner Party" is a detective mystery Visual Novel and Yuri Dating sim. Follow in the steps of Detective Rosie Morgan, one of the finest and brightest detectives at London's Metropolitan Police (Scotland Yard) as she investigates the mysterious death of a famous Human Rights Lawyer and her luxurious Sevenoaks Estate. See if you can unravel this mystery and perhaps even find love along the way...

Featuring:

- A gripping and mysterious storyline
- Beautiful Anime-style character art.
- Cool smooth jazz soundtrack
- In-depth detective analytical gameplay
- 50,000+ word count
- Multiple endings and romanceable characters
